article: israel 's airstrike on the lebanese village of qana could be part of `` a pattern of violations of international law '' in the fighting between israel and hezbollah in lebanon , un secretary-general kofi annan said in a report released on late monday .
abstract: annan says israel 's deadly attack on qana could breach international law
